select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`rank` as 'rank', a.`is_valid` as 'isValid', a.`goods_id` as 'goodsId', a.`color_id` as 'colorId', a.`goods_no` as 'goodsNo', a.`title` as 'title', a.`en_title` as 'enTitle', a.`thumb` as 'thumb', a.`photos` as 'photos', a.`color_value` as 'colorValue', a.`price` as 'price', a.`discount_price` as 'discountPrice', a.`description` as 'description', a.`en_description` as 'enDescription', a.`related_goods` as 'relatedGoods', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`update_time` as 'updateTime',
from `t_goods_item` as a
